meta.title: Sales AI Agent Decision Tree — Option A
meta.description: No automatic scoring. All leads routed to Calendly. Sales team decides fit. Contact form used for knowledge gap escalation only.

step_1_greeting.name: GREETING
step_1_greeting.prompt: Hi — I'm here to help you figure out if an inbound Sales AI Agent could work for your business. Mind if I ask a few questions?
step_1_greeting.context: No broad Halo Lab pitch. Visitor already chose this page.

step_2_introduction.name: INTRODUCTION
topics: What an inbound Sales AI Agent is
What it does: qualify leads, book meetings, handle FAQs

step_3_discovery_company.name: DISCOVERY_COMPANY
prompts: Tell me about your company — what do you do?

fails.message: Thanks for reaching out — this isn't something we're able to help with.

step_4_discovery_use_case.name: DISCOVERY_USE_CASE
step_4_discovery_use_case.prompt: What are you looking for in a Sales AI Agent?
exploration_areas: What problem is driving this need

step_5_discovery_pain_points.name: DISCOVERY_PAIN_POINTS
step_5_discovery_pain_points.prompt: What's the biggest pain in your current sales process?
exploration_areas: Too slow to respond to leads

step_6_discovery_volume.name: DISCOVERY_VOLUME
prompts: How many leads per month does your website currently get?
What kind of conversation volume do you expect after launch?
step_6_discovery_volume.purpose: Critical for Botpress plan scoping and pricing

step_7_discovery_current_stack.name: DISCOVERY_CURRENT_STACK
step_7_discovery_current_stack.prompt: What sales tools do you use today?

step_8_discovery_timeline.name: DISCOVERY_TIMELINE
prompts: When are you hoping to have this live?
Is there a trigger event — product launch, funding round?

urgent.label: URGENT
urgent.response: Timelines under a few weeks are tight — we can discuss phased approach on a call.

realistic.label: REALISTIC
realistic.response: That works well with our typical build timelines.

step_9_discovery_budget.name: DISCOVERY_BUDGET
prompts: What budget range are you working with for this project?
Who else is involved in the decision?

not_sure_or_wont_say.response: No problem — our projects typically start at €5,000. Let's discuss what's possible on a call.

step_10_qualification_summary.name: QUALIFICATION_SUMMARY
step_10_qualification_summary.description: Agent recaps collected information conversationally. NO score announced. CHAMP signals shape the language.
step_10_qualification_summary.prompt_template: Based on what you've shared, it sounds like you're looking to build an inbound lead qualification agent integrated with [CRM], targeting a go-live in about [timeline]. Let me connect you with our team to walk through the approach.

sufficient_data.action: Present Calendly link. Recap key points.

weak_signals.condition: Budget or timeline signals are weak
weak_signals.action: Flag softly. Still offer Calendly + phased approach.
weak_signals.note: Sales team assesses fit on call

knowledge_gap.condition: Knowledge gap detected at any point
knowledge_gap.action: Offer contact form. Agent continues qualifying after submit.

visitor_declines_calendly.action: Acknowledge. Offer contact form as fallback. Close warmly.

nurture_flow.trigger: Visitor is early-stage, not ready to commit

n1_share_resources.name: SHARE RESOURCES
n1_share_resources.prompt: Let me share a couple of examples of inbound Sales AI Agents we've built — these might give you a better feel for what's possible.

n2_check_in.name: CHECK IN
n2_check_in.prompt: Did any of those feel relevant to what you're working on?

n3_re_qualification.name: RE-QUALIFICATION
n3_re_qualification.prompt: What would need to change on your side for this to become something you'd want to explore more concretely?

n4_soft_calendly_nudge.name: SOFT CALENDLY NUDGE
n4_soft_calendly_nudge.prompt: Even if it's just exploratory, a 20-minute call with our team might help clarify things — no commitment needed. Want me to share the link?

n5_warm_close.name: WARM CLOSE
n5_warm_close.prompt: Totally understood — feel free to come back when the timing is better. I'll make a note of your situation so our team has context if you reach out.

knowledge_gap_escalation.trigger: Visitor asks a question at any point in the flow

can_answer_partially.follow_up: Our team can give more detail on a call.

cannot_answer.response: That's a great question — I don't have enough detail. Let me capture your question so our team gets back to you.
cannot_answer.note: Agent continues the conversation. Qualification does not stop.

off_topic.response: That's interesting! Coming back to your Sales AI Agent project...

skip_discovery.trigger: Visitor says 'Can I just schedule a call?'
skip_discovery.response: Absolutely! Just a couple quick questions so our team can prepare the right approach for you.
skip_discovery.action: Quick discovery (company + use case + timeline) → Calendly

unresponsive.response: Still there? No rush — let me know when you're ready to continue, or I can have our team reach out.
unresponsive.action: Wait for response or offer contact form

not_a_good_fit.trigger: Budget too low / timeline impossible / no clear need
not_a_good_fit.note: Option A = manual DQ — sales team makes final decision
not_a_good_fit.response: Based on what you've shared, let me connect you with our team — they can explore whether there's a way to make this work for your situation.
not_a_good_fit.action: Still offer Calendly. Sales team makes final DQ decision.
